sentences.en: Adopt in furniture such as drawer lock cabinet lock, window locklock and postbox lock etc.
sentences.cn: 适用于家具上使用的锁,如抽屉锁 、 橱窗锁、箱包锁、邮箱锁等.

sentences.en: He feels the floor of the post office move beneath him, and he tries to turn his eyes from her, to ground his gaze in something solid: postbox, ceiling tile, window.
sentences.cn: 他感到邮局的地板在脚下移动，他试图把视线从她身上挪开，让他的注视停留在某种结实可靠的东西上：邮箱、天花板上的瓷砖、窗户。

sentences.en: I stuck the stamp on and ran to the postbox.
sentences.cn: 我贴上邮票,然后向邮箱跑去.

sentences.en: I was so certain that it had happened, that I wrote a letter to my parents that same night and put it in the postbox at the corner of the street.
sentences.cn: 我如此地肯定这件事的发生，当晚我写信给我的父母，把信投进了街角的邮箱。

sentences.en: Input the user name, the system will send the password in your effective postbox automatically.
sentences.cn: 并输入用户名, 系统将自动发送密码到您的有效邮箱中.

sentences.en: She sealed the envelope and put it in the postbox.
sentences.cn: 她封上信封后把信放入邮筒.

sentences.en: The postbox leans a little bit.

trans.tran_en: a box in a public place, into which you put letters that you want to send
